name: Aviation Hurricane Storm
description:
In Aviation Hurricane Storm you'll become an air captain, who alone confronts the aggressors encroached on the sovereignty of your lands. The enemies won't spare those who are dear to you!

But in these difficult times, you are not alone. With you, a loyal airplane, called "Hurricane". It is your faithful ally and friend on the road to victory.

Fighting through the barrage fire, you must destroy the main air units of the invader. To win in these difficult times, use the advanced weapons that the allies supplies you.

Go ahead to your goal and do not be afraid of difficulties. This is a test for the strong in spirit!

Victory is inevitable!

Controls: (A, W, D, S) Acceleration: Shift
Shooting: Left and Right mouse button.
